title: REPLAYS
body: How do I play ROFL files so I can record them? I can't do it in the client as they're past the 20 game mark. Help would be wonderful.

replies.body:
You're unable to view replays after the match is no longer shown in your match history. To record a highlight, you'll want to hit the *download replay* button next the match in your match history, then you can record snippets of gameplay using the recording button at the button middle of the navigation pane. You can find out more on the Replay System in our [**FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/234965248-Replays-FAQ-Pro-Tips).

Let me know if you have any other questions.
+1, I have yet to figure out how to actually use them :c
